Name: Bang Bang Land
About the game: Take part in a number of marksmanship challenges while you explore Bang Bang Land an abandoned theme park designed by a Gun Nut that had to be closed down due to serious Health & Safety concerns and injury claims! Push your self to be the best in over 20 unique Marksmanship challenges with a variety of weapons at your disposal. Enjoy a number of theme park rides including a Roller-coaster, Waltza and some Unique to Bang Bang Land designed to push your balance and coordination to its limits while you try to take out as many targets as possible! **MAY NEED TO SIT DOWN DURING PLAY**
